message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. How about we aim for $10,000?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
